trackapBis.description: 6-month part-time internship (3 days per week) for Trackap. Worked as web developer

sobook.description: 4-month internship as fullstack developer for SoBook company

trackap.description: 6-month part-time internship (2 days per week) for Trackap. Worked as web developer

skipty.description: 6-month internship as web developer for the Skipty startup

delpharm.job: Packaging operator for Delpharm Lille, France
delpharm.description: 1 month fixed-term contract as a packaging operator for a pharmaceutical company.

forestBoy.name: Forest Boy
forestBoy.description: Die & Retry platform game inspired by current Super Meat Boy et Ori And The Blind Forest games. You embody a little red character and have as purpose to reach the end of the level alive

epicture.name: Epicture
epicture.what: Project developed with react native for an Epitech's 3rd year project
epicture.description: Based on already existing app: Imgur, the purpose of the project is to remake a soft version of this app with its basic features using Imgur's API (Categories, add photos, takes photos, user profile, fav, like, comments, research, sort)

astroBrawl.name: Astro Brawl
astroBrawl.what: Project developed with Unity in a context of a game jam within my university [Reworking in progress]
astroBrawl.description: For theme: 'space', we went on a Super Smash Bros game like in the space (up to 4 players). Having for only capacity a dash, the goal is to throw out of the viewport the other players to eliminate them

rewinder.name: Rewinder
rewinder.what: Project develped with Unity in a context of a game jam
rewinder.description: For theme: 'temporality', we went on an solo Adventure and enigma game. In a castle with a witched king, explore, avoid and succeed the enigmas using your back in time power!

gameOfLife.name: Game of life
gameOfLife.what: Project developed with Unity in the context of a game project at my Croatian university
gameOfLife.description: The Game of Life, is a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970. It is a zero-player game, meaning that its evolution is determined by its initial state. The game follows simple rules that define the living or dead state of a cell

apiSave.name: API save
apiSave.what: Project developed with nodeJS in a context of an internship project
apiSave.description: The purpose is to save the databases of clients on a company's server. The project is made of one server which stores the saves of each client as well as a unique API installed on each client's server, which creates the saves and send them to the storage server

about.title: About
about.description: A 5th year student in Epitech Lille, I particularly appreciate working on visual projects such as games or web development. As part of my studies, I lived 1 year in Croatia as an Erasmus during my 4th year and followed the Game Development program. Besides IT, I have been a climber for more than 10 years now. That is a very important activity to me because it allow me to relax, giving my best and keeping me in good shape.
